items.title: A Tribe of Grungs
items.description: A small tribe of colorful frog-like Grungs ambush the party, attempting to coat their weapons in poison.

items.title: The Wandering Merchant
items.description: A kind traveling merchant offers the party strange and unusual wares, including rare potions and a mysterious map.

items.title: An Ancient Ruin
items.description: The party stumbles upon the weathered remains of a forgotten temple, with an ominous hum resonating from within.

items.title: A Hungry Cave Troll
items.description: A massive, reclusive troll blocks the party's path, looking for its next meal.

items.title: Lost Owlbear Cub
items.description: The party finds a frightened owlbear cub, abandoned and alone. Its mother is likely not far behind.
